snippet.title: Glitcheon Web Demo Trailer | ONLINE NOW!
snippet.description:
Play the free demo here: https://river-forge-games.itch.io/glitcheon

Wishlist Glitcheon on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1533160/Glitcheon

Join our community: https://discord.com/invite/EEZeCfK
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GlitcheonGame

Trailer edited by Aenjo https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE8AqII7ax9FV2mNaTUFWUg/

Glitcheon is an upcoming Metroidvania where every time you collect a new abilty, the game world gets glitchier and new intentional bugs are introduced.

Enter this 2D action platformer and uncover the secrets of a dystopian mega-corporation: The Forum. Playing as a sentient forum account, your progress in the game makes the world glitchier, opening exploits for you to explore closer and closer to the core.

Glitcheon is made by Yän, River Forge and Bonicle
